snippet: While the Astros’ recent top draft picks are still in the minor leagues, several long-term answers are now everyday players in Houston.
abstract: Extra Bases column; Houston Astros have won 10 of their last 14 games, posting a winning record since their miserable 9-19 April; while Astros recent top draft picks are still in the minor leagues, several long-term answers are now everyday players in Houston; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: While the Astros’ recent top draft picks are still in the minor leagues, several long-term answers are now everyday players in Houston.

headline.seo: The Overhaul of the Astros Is Starting to Bear Fruit
headline.main: The Astros Are on the Verge of Winning for Losing
headline.print_headline: The Astros Are on the Verge of Winning for Losing
